question: Which of the following is the only Indian team participating for the Google Lunar XPRIZE competition?
explanation: Team Indus comprises about 100 people mostly engineers is led by Rahul Narayan. It is the only Indian team participating to win the $20 million Google Lunar X Prize. The team has tied up with Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) with the aim of hoisting India’s flag through an unmanned spacecraft on the lunar surface on January 26, 2018, the 69th Republic Day.
